name: Yggdrasil
passiveSkills: Block incoming damage for allies below 50% HP and take 10% of your MAX HP as random damage for each attack blocked
Immune to all Blind and Skill Disabling effects, including Silver and Innate effects
Reduce Healing on all enemies by 50%
Grant Golden Hit to each ally for 2 turns at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
Inflict Doom on each enemy suffering from Perfect Stun for 2 turns at the start of battle and at the start of your turn.
